repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:stretch

MAINTAINER Thomas Honeyman

# Global install yarn package manager
# Global install purescript, pulp, and bower
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y curl apt-transport-https && \
    curl -f -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | apt-key add - && \
    echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list && \
    apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y yarn && \
    yarn global add purescript pulp bower && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

USER node
